mapper.select: select b.brand_name, p.pd_name, p.pd_date, pp.pdphoto_link, pd.pd_by_dfs_price from products_tb p, sub_category_tb s, middle_category_tb mi, main_category_tb ma, products_by_duty_free_shop_tb pd, brand_tb b, products_photo_tb pp where ma.main_no = mi.main_no and mi.mid_cate_no = s.mid_cate_no and s.sub_no = p.sub_no and p.pd_no = pd.pd_no and p.brand_no = b.brand_no and p.pd_no = pp.pd_no and ma.main_no = 5 and p.pd_no = 23
